title: S1 Team LF Top Laner
body:
Hey all,

We are currently looking to rebuild our team up, with people who can keep a cool head when behind and not flame,learn from mistakes and be open to advice from the team as a whole (nobody is perfect and can always improve on things)

Currently are sitting at Silver 1, through our climb so far we have always skipped divisions so we have hopes to continue climbing the same way. We are Semi-Serious we want to push our limits and climb as high as we can.

Once we have our solid 5 we will set times for games and practice
most likely will be week nights from 6pm onwards and Sundays.

We are looking for a solid Top laner
IGN:
Age:
Current Rank(not really important):
Top Champs:
Voice chat is a must, currently we are using Skype

replies.body:
ign: pink blits
age: 22
rank: bouncing around mid silver
top champs: gnar, shen, maokai, olaf

pretty much free when ever
if you are on tonight from around 7pm onwards i will be running some games with the whole team to see synergy, add me (if you havent already) and you can join a game or two and see how you fit

Keen as to join. I was Silver 1 but let my brother use my account while I was away. Just getting back to S4 now. My history are all his games. I main top/adc, but can play all roles. I'm pretty casual and play weeknights and Sunday's.
